alert.note: Alert for Kuskokwim Delta (Alaska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.headline: High Wind Warning issued September 17 at 2:58AM AKDT until September 17 at 10:00AM AKDT by NWS Anchorage
info.description: ...HIGH WIND WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 10 AM AKDT THIS MORNING... * WHAT...South winds 40 to 50 mph with gusts of 65 mph expected. * WHERE...Kuskokwim Delta. * WHEN...Through 10 AM AKDT today. * IMPACTS...High winds may move loose objects, damage property, and cause power outages. Travel will be difficult. * ADDITIONAL DETAILS...The powerful low that is impacting the region this morning has reached the Bering Strait. Expect winds to diminish slowly through the morning, with gusts up to 65 mph along the coast.
info.instruction: People should avoid being outside in forested areas and around trees and branches. If possible, remain in the lower levels of your home during the windstorm, and avoid windows. Use caution if you must drive.
